name: A King and His Choices to Success
name_original: A King and His Choices to Success
description:
You're a new Emperor, make choices wisely to flourish your empire.

The game contains:

- 3 endings (which one you get will depend on your decision in the game)

- +4,000 words

- Extra scene to unlock

- Information about second wave civilizations

*The game is fictional, none of the character in the game is real.

*The game is made for a history class
